author: .asanso
content: hi just want to raise a little concern I have w.r.t. `point_evaluation_precompile` tl.dr this is part of EIP-2537 in disguise because it expose a restricted version of pairing on BLS12-381 . My experience tells me that once an API is available people start to use in creative way so it might be useful to properly open this pairing operation to be more generic? Please see https://notes.ethereum.org/KC6d-viTRr-MV16Y9gfL-g?view in particular the Alternative solution section

author: ralexstokes
content: we'd need to change the API of the precompile but i think it is strongly worth considering given how important BLS signature verification is
